bio.description: A short bio for the user.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user was created.

Question.title: Question
Question.description: A question submitted to a user.

toUserId.description: The ID of the user the question is for.

isAnswered.description: Whether the question has been answered.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the question was created.

answeredAt.description: The timestamp when the question was answered.

Note.title: Note
Note.description: A private note for a user.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the note was created.

/users/{userId}.description: Top-level collection for user profiles. The document ID (`userId`) is the same as the Firebase Auth user ID.

/questions/{questionId}.description: Top-level collection for all questions. We query this collection to find questions for a specific user. The document ID (`questionId`) is auto-generated by Firestore.

/users/{userId}/notes/{noteId}.description: This is a subcollection. Each user document can have its own `notes` collection. This is great for data that is strongly tied to a parent document. The document ID (`noteId`) is auto-generated.
